SELECT t1.* , t2.real_name ,t3.licence ,t4.park_name FROM t_carport t1 LEFT JOIN t_owner t2 ON t2.id = t1.owner_id LEFT JOIN t_car t3 ON t3.id = t1.car_id LEFT JOIN t_park t4 ON t4.id = t1.park_id WHERE t1.deleted = 0
AND t2.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
AND t3.licence LIKE CONCAT('%',#{licence},'%')
AND t4.park_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkName},'%')
AND t1.carport_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carportName},'%')
